result.eng: Is the room free?
result.ga: An bhfuil an seomra saor
result.orig: An bhfuil an seomra saor
result.html: An bhfuil an seomra saorIs the room free?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil an seomra saorIs the room free?

result.eng: We has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.
result.ga: Bhí orainn codladh in aon seomra
result.orig: Bhí orainn codladh in aon seomra
result.html: Bhí orainn codladh in aon seomraWe has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí orainn codlaḋ in aon seomraWe has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.

result.eng: There was a small room at the top of the house.
result.ga: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tí
result.orig: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tí
result.html: Bhí seomra beag in uachtar an tíThere was a small room at the top of the house.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí seomra beag in uaċtar an tíThere was a small room at the top of the house.

result.eng: It is not very warm in the bedroom.
result.ga: Níl sé an-te sa seomra leapa
result.orig: Níl sé an-te sa seomra leapa
result.html: Níl sé an-te sa seomra leapaIt is not very warm in the bedroom.
result.ponchtml: Níl sé an-te sa seomra leapaIt is not very warm in the bedroom.

result.eng: He ran into the room.
result.ga: Rith sé isteach sa seomra
result.orig: Rith sé isteach sa seomra
result.html: Rith sé isteach sa seomraHe ran into the room.
result.ponchtml: Riṫ sé isteaċ sa seomraHe ran into the room.

result.eng: Come to me across the room.
result.ga: Tar chugam trasna an tseomra
result.orig: Tar chugam trasna an tseomra
result.html: Tar chugam trasna an tseomraCome to me across the room.
result.ponchtml: Tar ċugam trasna an tseomraCome to me across the room.

result.eng: She showed me her bedroom.
result.ga: Thaispeáin sí a seomra leapa dom
result.orig: Thaispeáin sí a seomra leapa dom
result.html: Thaispeáin sí a seomra leapa domShe showed me her bedroom.
result.ponchtml: Ṫaispeáin sí a seomra leapa domShe showed me her bedroom.

result.eng: The room is full of smoke.
result.ga: Tá an seomra lán de dheatach
result.orig: Tá an seomra lán de dheatach
result.html: Tá an seomra lán de dheatachThe room is full of smoke.
result.ponchtml: Tá an seomra lán de ḋeataċThe room is full of smoke.

result.eng: We have booked a room.
result.ga: Tá seomra in áirithe againn
result.orig: Tá seomra in áirithe againn
result.html: Tá seomra in áirithe againnWe have booked a room.
result.ponchtml: Tá seomra in áiriṫe againnWe have booked a room.

result.eng: Your room number?
result.ga: Uimhir do sheomra
result.orig: Uimhir do sheomra
result.html: Uimhir do sheomraYour room number?
result.ponchtml: Uiṁir do ẛeomraYour room number?

result.eng: How many bedrooms do you need?
result.ga: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá uait
result.orig: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá uait
result.html: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá uaitHow many bedrooms do you need?
result.ponchtml: Cé ṁéad seomra codlata atá uaitHow many bedrooms do you need?

result.eng: There are three bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.
result.ga: Tá trí sheomra codlata cisteanach agus seomra suite ann
result.orig: Tá trí sheomra codlata cisteanach agus seomra suite ann
result.html: Tá trí sheomra codlata cisteanach agus seomra suite annThere are three bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.
result.ponchtml: Tá trí ẛeomra codlata cisteanaċ agus seomra suite annThere are three bedrooms, a kitchen, and a living room.

result.eng: I like the hall and the sitting room.
result.ga: Is maith liom an halla agus an seomra suite
result.orig: Is maith liom an halla agus an seomra suite
result.html: Is maith liom an halla agus an seomra suiteI like the hall and the sitting room.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom an halla agus an seomra suiteI like the hall and the sitting room.

result.eng: And the bedrooms and the bathroom are on the right.
result.ga: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folctha ar dheis
result.orig: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folctha ar dheis
result.html: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folctha ar dheisAnd the bedrooms and the bathroom are on the right.
result.ponchtml: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folcṫa ar ḋeisAnd the bedrooms and the bathroom are on the right.

result.eng: There is only a shower in the bathroom.
result.ga: Níl ach cithfholcadán sa seomra folctha
result.orig: Níl ach cithfholcadán sa seomra folctha
result.html: Níl ach cithfholcadán sa seomra folcthaThere is only a shower in the bathroom.
result.ponchtml: Níl aċ ciṫḟolcadán sa seomra folcṫaThere is only a shower in the bathroom.

result.eng: There are two bedrooms, a very nice kitchen and a very big sitting room.
result.ga: Tá dhá sheomra codlata ann cistin an-deas agus seomra suí an-mhór
result.orig: Tá dhá sheomra codlata ann cistin an-deas agus seomra suí an-mhór
result.html: Tá dhá sheomra codlata ann cistin an-deas agus seomra suí an-mhórThere are two bedrooms, a very nice kitchen and a very big sitting room.
result.ponchtml: Tá ḋá ẛeomra codlata ann cistin an-deas agus seomra suí an-ṁórThere are two bedrooms, a very nice kitchen and a very big sitting room.

result.eng: How many rooms are there in the house? - Three.
result.ga: Cé mhéad seomra atá sa teach - Trí cinn
result.orig: Cé mhéad seomra atá sa teach - Trí cinn
result.html: Cé mhéad seomra atá sa teach - Trí cinnHow many rooms are there in the house? - Three.
result.ponchtml: Cé ṁéad seomra atá sa teaċ - Trí cinnHow many rooms are there in the house? - Three.

result.eng: How many bedrooms are there?
result.ga: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá ann
result.orig: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá ann
result.html: Cé mhéad seomra codlata atá annHow many bedrooms are there?
result.ponchtml: Cé ṁéad seomra codlata atá annHow many bedrooms are there?

result.eng: It's an old terraced house and there are only three rooms.
result.ga: Seanteach sraithe atá ann agus níl ach trí sheomra ann
result.orig: Seanteach sraithe atá ann agus níl ach trí sheomra ann
result.html: Seanteach sraithe atá ann agus níl ach trí sheomra annIt's an old terraced house and there are only three rooms.
result.ponchtml: Seanteaċ sraiṫe atá ann agus níl aċ trí ẛeomra annIt's an old terraced house and there are only three rooms.

result.eng: The kitchen and sitting room are one room.
result.ga: Tá an chistin agus seomra suite mar sheomra amháin
result.orig: Tá an chistin agus seomra suite mar sheomra amháin
result.html: Tá an chistin agus seomra suite mar sheomra amháinThe kitchen and sitting room are one room.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċistin agus seomra suite mar ẛeomra aṁáinThe kitchen and sitting room are one room.

result.eng: When I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.
result.ga: Nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramach
result.orig: Nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramach
result.html: Nuair a tugadh mo rogha seomra dom san óstán d'fhreagraíos go cúramachWhen I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a tugaḋ mo roġa seomra dom san óstán d'ḟreagraíos go cúramaċWhen I was asked what kind of room I wanted in the hotel, I answered carefully.

result.eng: Up I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.
result.ga: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar bharr an tí
result.orig: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar bharr an tí
result.html: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar bharr an tíUp I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.
result.ponchtml: Suas liom go seomra 1026 ar ḃarr an tíUp I went to room 1026 at the top of the house.

result.eng: I still have the room's keyring.
result.ga: Tá fáinne eochrach an tseomra fós agam
result.orig: Tá fáinne eochrach an tseomra fós agam
result.html: Tá fáinne eochrach an tseomra fós agamI still have the room's keyring.
result.ponchtml: Tá fáinne eoċraċ an tseomra fós agamI still have the room's keyring.
